scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts three figures against a starry blue background. On the right, a bearded man wearing a crown and a blue robe adorned with gold flowers sits on a throne-like structure draped in gold fabric. He gestures with his right hand. To the left, two men stand. The one in the foreground wears a red robe over a blue garment and a conical hat, pointing with his left hand. Behind him, a younger man in a tan tunic looks towards the seated figure. The ground is depicted as green with tufts of grass.
